recommended_degree: Ilmu Kesehatan Masyarakat, Kesehatan Masyarakat, Keselamatan Kesehatan Kerja, Keselamatan dan Kesehatan Kerja, Kesehatan dan Keselamatan Kerja (Sarjana)
job_description:
1. Support EHS team in planning, developing, and implementing risk management activities, HIRADC review, safety audit and inspection.
2. Review and prepare documents related to EHS such as HIRADC & EIA, chemical safety data sheet, collect first aid needs from all departments.
3. Support and collaborate with other department to determine the requirement for EHS policy/procedures in accordance with the government regulation.
4. Support EHS in safety training, EHS meeting, internal and external inspection.
5. Identify, collect, and summarize new update of government regulation related to EHS and check the compliance.
6. Assist EHS team in developing and monitoring environment, health, and safety operation and tasks assigned at factory sites.
7. Support to identify, review, and prepare incident and accident investigation report and EHS statistics.
8. Follow up non conformances EHS audit findings.
9. Assist to prepare P2K3 report.
